Advanced StatusBar Example

This is an advanced example of customizing the Ext.ux.StatusBar component via a plugin.

Customizing the StatusBar

The ValidationStatus plugin hooks into the StatusBar and automatically monitors the validation status of any fields in the associated FormPanel. Items of interest: - The StatusBar syncs in real-time with the valid state of the form as you type - When the form is invalid, the error status message can be clicked to hide/show a custom error list - The error list items can be clicked to focus the associated fields - After submitting successfully, note that the confirmation status message will fade out after 5 seconds and return to the default status (this is a config option)
